com.cmput301.t05.habilect

Class TreeGrowth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.t05.habilect.TreeGrowth

  • public class TreeGrowth
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is responsible for tree growth to track nutrient level, the last rank up tier as well as the last sync date. Created by StevenC on 2017-11-23.
